name: places/ChIJiwT6jXVZwokRrWm7u-uNtqE
adrFormatAddress: 253 1st Ave., New York, NY 10003, USA

editorialSummary.text: Drugstore chain selling a variety of beauty & health products, plus some grocery & household items.

originalText.text: So grateful this pharmacy is open late. I tested positive for Covid went to city MD. They called in a prescription for Paxlovid. I walked over, walked in one person ahead of me, and the gentleman behind the counter gave it to me quickly efficiently and with a friendly manner, I should've gotten his name, but so so grateful for the service, and I was impressed all around. My experience was very good!

originalText.text: To the rude Indian woman at the pharmacy counter today who turned my elderly mom away because she walked in 1:30 even after she pleased with her...remember that there is karma in life and that you too will be elderly one day if you are blessed to live as long. God does not like ugly.

text.text: To the rude Indian woman at the pharmacy counter today who turned my elderly mom away because she walked in 1:30 even after she pleased with her...remember that there is karma in life and that you too will be elderly one day if you are blessed to live as long. God does not like ugly.

originalText.text:
DO NOT USE THIS PHARMACY!

Stay aware from Regina in the pharmacy.

3 times over 2 days, I went to Regina for the same prescription. The first time I was told to come back in 45 min. Then I came the next day and told to come back in 15 min. Then I came back in 5 hours, and it was out of stock. Each time I went, I waited in a 20 min line. She then sent us to a different location that “had it in stock”. Once we got to the other location, they didn't have it in stock and told us that Regina didn't release the prescription, so even if they had it, they could not fulfill it.  We then needed to go back once again to request the prescription to be released (as you can't call them) and buy it at a different location.

Regina has been extremely rude the whole time, treating me like it’s absurd that I need my medication. I recommend staying away from this pharmacy. Poorly run and treat your horribly when you just want your medication.

originalText.text: Once had the best Pharmacy staff now all have retired! Unfortunately it’s all changed  the current pharmacy staff are often uncivil rude and ought to be replaced! Waiting on the inevitable long line to obtain your prescription can become a super unpleasant situation along with unfamiliar odors this CVS IS not the cleanest to shop in! Fatima store manager isn’t the most reliable or helpful staff! I do not recommend this CVS especially as some of the young pharmacists are profoundly unprofessional offensive and discourteous! WORST EXPERIENCE TRY TO AVOID,

originalText.text: Yea, all the reviews are true. Rude employees. Plus, they ask an ID with simple store purchases. I’m sorry CVS but I’m not comfortable with you tracking me and logging my personal information into your system. Go to Walgreens on 14th. Must better customer service. And they don’t seem to have stupid policies like this place.
